message: I wonder if it's just with me, but sometimes the whole page will refresh while typing a message. Not cool! Also the message box doesn't auto-expand. Otherwise, the UI is sweet.
The ability to italicize/boldilize things would be nice, too.
Yeah, it'd be cool if the message box were a bit smarter... Also, it seems weird to me that the text in the composition box is much bigger than the text once it's posted.
Empty responses should count
yeah, i started seeing the whole page refresh sometimes today too
seems like it's just when the page has been open for almost 120 seconds
Oh noes
So the page is only supposed to reload when the long polling stuff hasn't been able to get a response in 60000ms
thought it might be something with my Fluid app, but no, it's happening in Chrome too
@markpasc If it's not too much trouble, could you let me know, are the json responses for /live/ objects like {"messages": [...]} ?
oh man, it totally shouldn't be refreshing :(
I haven't seen this either, so you know. Latest Chrome, OS X
and I can't reproduce the issue on my end
the body of which was a stacktrace for a 'NoneType' has no attribute 'profile' exception
Is there a way to turn the refreshing off?
I've lost several posts because the screen refreshes and dumps what I've written.
but then it refreshed so i didn't see what it was
on the last “live” request
ah, there was a javascript error in the console right when the page refreshed
@ericflo i'm getting a lot of: {"error": "There were no messages"}
(also my unread message counter says 5 but there aren't any unread topics in the Groups dropdown)
@Chris_Huntley I'm terribly sorry about that, I'm about to fix it
console said “Failed to load resource: the server responded with a status of 500 (Internal Server Error)”
Was it the null being send as a string thing  @ericflo ?
http://i.imgur.com/LStiU.png
@markpasc You are my HERO
@ericflo I've been really scratching my head over this one
@spencer in honesty we're having a hard time actually working on the product, ha!
We'll figure it out :)
@spencer It was a surprise, to be sure

@ericflo a colleague and I were talking about how much crowdsourced feedback, bug reporting and fixes you guys were getting and our minds are blown. Did you expect this at all or is was it a surprise?
OK, theoretically this should be fixed now
s/send/sent/
@matfac there's a user script here (https://github.com/mal/convorenient) that will hold the fort until @ericflo & co can get to it
I agree with the original poster: the textbox should auto-expand.
@mal No, it was two problems, both of the things that @markpasc pointed out
@mal thanks, but this happens: http://i.min.us/ilDA3g.png
@ericflo isn't reloading anymore for me at least! thanks!
Good job @ericflo And thank god for user feedback!
